Text:
Hey mc,you read my mind,I was going to request this ! thanks also for their Adventures album,great to hear it for the first time all these years later. Whilst I'm here I have a few requests for you :
Visage...The Anvil
Spandau Ballet...Journeys To Glory & Diamond
 I Level (self titled) I had a 12'' of theirs way back('83, I think,called Minefield) and have been looking for their album for yonks !
Thanks again for your stellar uploads..me likey !
thank you...and jasperjoys requests sound good to me.
